#summary Specific balancer for web requests

= PUROPSE =

HTTP and HTTPS load balancer features.

== Features ==

  * Sticky sessions
  * SSL Off Loading
  * SSL Pass Through
  * Content Filtering
  * Content Caching
  * Content Switching
  * Virtual Host support for Virtual Servers
  * URL Rewriting
  * Custom Headers
  * Compression
  * Module Plug In Support
  * Customizable HTTP Logging Format
